statements: SELECT * FROM voice_interaction_data;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date FROM voice_interaction_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT transcript FROM voice_interaction_data WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, transcript FROM voice_interaction_data ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id FROM voice_interaction_data;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_date FROM voice_interaction_data ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM voice_interaction_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM voice_interaction_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, AVG(LENGTH(transcript)) AS avg_transcript_length FROM voice_interaction_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, transcript FROM voice_interaction_data WHERE transcript ILIKE '%hello%' AND user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM voice_interaction_data;
SELECT user_id, voice_text FROM voice_interaction_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, voice_text, interaction_date FROM voice_interaction_data WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_accuracy WHERE accuracy_score > 0.8;
SELECT interaction_id, accuracy_score, feedback FROM voice_assistant_accuracy WHERE interaction_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM voice_interaction_data WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM voice_interaction_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 2;
SELECT user_id, AVG(accuracy_score) as avg_accuracy FROM voice_interaction_data JOIN voice_assistant_accuracy ON voice_interaction_data.id = voice_assistant_accuracy.interaction_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT interaction_date, voice_text FROM voice_interaction_data WHERE voice_text LIKE '%search%' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions, SUM(accuracy_score) as total_accuracy FROM voice_interaction_data JOIN voice_assistant_accuracy ON voice_interaction_data.id = voice_assistant_accuracy.interaction_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 AND total_accuracy > 80;
SELECT * FROM VoiceCommands;
SELECT command, response FROM VoiceCommands WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT voice_input, timestamp FROM VoiceInteractions WHERE interaction_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM Users WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT vi.interaction_id, vi.timestamp, vc.command, vc.response FROM VoiceInteractions vi JOIN VoiceCommands vc ON vi.interaction_id = vc.interaction_id WHERE vi.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT vi.voice_input, vc.command FROM VoiceInteractions vi LEFT JOIN VoiceCommands vc ON vi.interaction_id = vc.interaction_id WHERE vi.user_id = 100 ORDER BY vi.interaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT u.name, vc.command, vc.response FROM Users u JOIN VoiceInteractions vi ON u.user_id = vi.user_id JOIN VoiceCommands vc ON vi.interaction_id = vc.interaction_id WHERE u.age < 50 ORDER BY vi.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM voice_interactions;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, voice_output FROM voice_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT model_name, trained_date FROM voice_models ORDER BY trained_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM voice_interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM voice_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT users.username, voice_interactions.voice_input FROM users JOIN voice_interactions ON users.user_id = voice_interactions.user_id;
SELECT MAX(trained_date) AS latest_trained_date, model_name FROM voice_models GROUP BY model_name;
SELECT user_id, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, timestamp, CURTIME())) AS avg_response_time FROM voice_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_response_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT transcript FROM transcripts WHERE interaction_id = 101 ORDER BY transcript_id DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, timestamp, transcript FROM voice_interactions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT analysis_data->>'sentiment' AS sentiment FROM analysis_results WHERE interaction_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM voice_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, transcript FROM voice_interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT v.transcript, u.username FROM voice_interactions v INNER JOIN users u ON v.user_id = u.user_id WHERE v.interaction_id = 456;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM voice_interactions;
SELECT v.transcript, a.analysis_data->>'sentiment' AS sentiment FROM voice_interactions v LEFT JOIN analysis_results a ON v.interaction_id = a.interaction_id WHERE sentiment = 'positive';
